name: Based Apu
description: Based Apu is the based,adorable, and more memeable version of Pepe the Frog. Imagine Wojak after five cups of espresso, a motivational TED Talk, and a year of hitting the gym. That’s Based Apu. He’s the ultimate vibe: adorable, unbothered, and unapologetically based. Some say he’s the long-lost cousin of Pepe, but let’s be real—Based Apu would probably steal Pepe’s lunch and his girl if he wanted to. From posting memes that make you laugh-cry at 3 AM to riding the crypto wave like a pro surfer, Based Apu is here to turn your “WAGMI” dreams into reality.
